attributes.action: Scrap any plans to routinely finger print 11-16 year olds for passport applications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been reported in the press that the government has plans to routinely fingerprint 11-16 year olds when they apply for passports. This is a sinister development, and a further step down the road to a surveillance society that we do not want.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
